articles.author: Daniel Patrascu
articles.title: Area of Mars Visited by Curiosity Shows Steep Cliffs and Blue Water, It's a Camera Trick - autoevolution
articles.description: There are two kinds of hardware presently involved in keeping a close eye on Mars: we have the rovers on the surface (three still active, two American and on Chinese), and the orbiters that spin around the planet (8 still active out of a total of 18 send ther…
articles.content: The two American rovers currently trekking the reddish plains of the planet are the Curiosity and the recently-arrived Perseverance. The former just celebrated its ninth year on the planet back in Au… [+1298 chars]

articles.title: World Aids Day is December 1 - MSNBC
articles.description: Nearly 40 years after the first reported case of HIV, 1.2 million Americans are living with the virus. World Aids Day is meant to raise awareness about routi...
